category: About the Gender DEI Toolkit Volume II

content.text: The four groups used for arranging the challenges faced by organizations in implementing DEI practices in the Gender DEI Toolkit Volume II are based on the groups and categories of the Global Diversity, Equity and Inclusion Benchmarks (GDEIB) 2021. The MARC team is grateful to Yvonne (Nene) Kegomoditswe Molefi, Julie Oâ€™Mara, and Alan Richter, authors of GDEIB 2021. The team also acknowledges the contribution of Zahid Mubarak, CEO of HR Metrics, in raising awareness about the GDEIB standards in Pakistan.

The MARC team is extremely grateful to the following organizations for their contribution in Volume I and/or Volume II (in alphabetical order): Abacus, ASK Development, Bank Alfalah, Bank of Punjab, Bestway Cement, British Council, Careem, Engro Polymers and Chemicals Limited, Fauji Fertilizer Company Limited, Feroze1888, FINCA Microfinance Bank Limited, Hashoo Group, HR Business Solutions, HRSG, Interloop, Jazz, JS Bank, Mobilink Microfinance Bank Limited, Nayatel, PPAF, PTCL, S&P Global, Shell, Siemens, Telenor, Teradata, The Change Factory, TPL Corporation, Transworld Associates, Unilever, Women Technology House, and others who chose to remain anonymous.

The team also extends its appreciation to the cartoonist of Volume II, Syeda Hussain Fatima, for her extensive discussions with the Volume II team, resulting in the various comic style cartoons for Volume II.
